name: Youtube Download MP3
description: Extracts audio from YouTube videos as MP3 files using RapidAPI. Supports custom filenames
author: Shinkai

apiKey.description: RapidAPI key for YouTube MP3 converter service access. Required for all operations

fileName.description: Custom filename for output MP3 file. If omitted, uses sanitized video title

youtubeUrl.description: Full YouTube video URL or video ID. Must be public video with available audio

audiofile.description: Final filename of saved MP3 file, including path if applicable

error.description: Detailed error message if download/conversion fails. Null if successful

rapidDownloadUrl.description: Direct download URL for the converted MP3 file from RapidAPI service
